Key Match Events: The benches cleared in the 6th inning of the game due to a slide by Maikel Garcia into second base, which was perceived as aggressive by Anthony Volpe.
Pre-Game Insights: There was much talk about the open hostility between the two teams during a rivalry from 1976 through â€˜80, when they battled in the playoffs four times in five years.
Post-Match Reflections: Maikel Garcia felt that Anthony Volpe used his forearm to shove him below the chin while tagging him out, and Volpe defended his actions by stating that everyone is playing hard.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series was decided by two runs or less in all four games.
